creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: pieced ikat (red, green, yellow, white) triangle with attached red wool front and lower borders, coming to point--lined and fringed on lower edge in green and wine color; braided embroidered edging; multicolored, multi-patterned embroidery overall on attached front and borders; cotton label 152
title: Headcloth
